## NormalizedAssetReferenceHandlerFactoryType type

How should we handle how to hash asset file reference and how to add file
extension (or not).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NormalizedAssetReferenceHandlerFactoryType = (
  hashingHandler: HashingFunctionType,
  extensionHandler: NormalizedAssetFileExtensionExtractorType,
) => NormalizedAssetReferenceHandlerType
```
